channel.title: CVE Feed for Toastie Studio -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Toastie Studio -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-31109|2024-08-02T01:46:04.528Z -- toastie%20studio -- woocommerce%20social%20media%20share%20buttons
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Toastie Studio Woocommerce Social Media Share Buttons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Woocommerce Social Media Share Buttons: from n/a through 1.3.0.
